original_title: The Red Hot Chili Peppers Phenomenon - The Independent Review
overview: This is the powerful critical review of the Red Hot Chili Peppers on record, on stage and on film. Drawing on live performance footage drawn from Woodstock and Red Square, the DVD features rare archive film and extensive interviews with the band, along with the reflections of RHCP insiders and critics, including the first full length interview with former Chilis producer Andy Gill.
title: The Red Hot Chili Peppers Phenomenon - The Independent Review
